channel.title: Java++ Problem
channel.description:
Hello, I use this server http://www.multiupload.com/6S1VDN5V7O on windows xp and work fine. but now I change windows to windows 7 and get this error when I turn on server "java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: no %CommonProgramFiles%\System\ado\msado15 in shared library path"
Help me please! :)

item.title: Java++ Problem
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

Solution: Don’t use J++, it’s an outdated pile of crap created by Microsoft and then later dropped because Sun filed a lawsuit.

Read full topic
